dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Aaaa-lright everyone, I am OFFICIALLY starting today's practice!

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: Not the way we have to be if we want to nail our audition!

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: We have to perfect EVERYTHING to make sure we have it down. Rockie M's not gonna...

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: ...Sonu? You can just interrupt me if you wanna say something. No need to look at me with sopping wet eyes.

dialogue.name: Sonu
dialogue.text: So, I do have a list of things I wanted to go over before the audition because I noticed our practices don't have a formal structure and I think we could benefit from--

dialogue.name: Niimi
dialogue.text: Teacher, can I go to the washroom?

dialogue.name: Fayruz
dialogue.text: *sigh* Okaaay, I GUESS we can go over the basics.
